dt: {bc}a light with a reflector and special lens mounted on the front of a vehicle to illuminate the road ahead
{bc}a light worn on the forehead (as of a miner or physician)

shortdef: a light with a reflector and special lens mounted on the front of a vehicle to illuminate the road ahead; also : the beam cast by a headlight
a light worn on the forehead (as of a miner or physician)
